articles.content: India vs Bangladesh Live Score, Asian Games 2023: Bangladesh were restricted to 96/9 as India's bowlers put up a brilliant show. R Sai Kishore finished with 3/12 and Washingto Sundar picked 2/15. Fol… [+17211 chars]

articles.author: Neuroscience News
articles.title: Caffeine Cuts Parkinson's, Even with Genetic Predisposition - Neuroscience News
articles.description: The findings spotlight caffeine's potential in mitigating neuroinflammation and cell death, though the exact interaction with Asian PD gene variants remains to be explored.
articles.content:
Summary: New research unveils a significant correlation between caffeine consumption and a lowered risk of Parkinsons Disease (PD) for individuals with Asian gene variants linked to the disorder.

articles.title: Asian Games, compound archery: After multiple gold medals from Jyothi & Co, coach Sanjeeva Singh, who brought it to India, basks in glory - The Indian Express
articles.description: Mihir Vasavda writes from Hangzhou: The man who brought the format to the country and trained the first champions revels in the achievements of Jyothi, Ojas & Co.
